content: this legal text provides an overview of the progress of a specific case referred to as case n° 1732022 without disclosing the names of the parties involved the case involves a party who owes 12149 euros to someone else the text explains that the case lasted for 10 months from march 30 2022 to january 20 2023 a judicial division is being made to allocate assets and the parties involved are identified as mrs c c p c e cg and mr f the property owned by ms c is being divided based on its equivalent value the text discusses the regulation of interest coheirs portions in the civil code stating that portions should be composed homogeneously but parties can agree to allocate assets in a nonhomogeneous manner the text then describes a meeting that took place on january 20 2023 at the mediation body ma srl in nola the parties involved in the case are identified as csa cm cg cp and vasd and they were represented by their respective attorneys the parties authorized the mediation process according to ministerial decree 1452011 the text mentions that a mediation petition was transmitted on march 30 2022 and an attempt at conciliation was proposed by csa cm and cg the first mediation meeting was scheduled for april 27 2022 but it was postponed another meeting was set for may 11 2022 where the mediator explained the benefits and costs of the mediation process during the meeting on may 11 2022 the parties requested a short adjournment to see if a conciliatory agreement could be reached the next mediation meeting was postponed several times until the current session at the current meeting the parties expressed their willingness to continue the mediation attempt and reached a conciliatory agreement the agreement may be subject to registration tax if it is less than €5000000 the designated mediator confirms that the conciliatory agreement complies with mandatory rules and can be enforced the proceedings are declared closed and the costs of mediation are determined the costs for the applicants are €12149 including vat and the costs for the adhering parties are also €12149 including vat the verbal record of the proceedings was closed on january 20 2023 in nola
